backstory: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...

episodes.title: The Foyer

creature.name: Bob
creature.introduction: Hi, my name is Bob, but you can call me Bobby.
creature.story: I was born without vowels. Can you help me find some vowels?

episodes.room_description: You find yourself in an ugly room with purple wallpaper.

traps.text: The treasure chest lid was rusty and sharp. You cut your hand and contract tetanus.

name: Foyer
room_description: The room is damp and poorly lit. You can see slime on the floor around your feet. You hear a muffled growl in one corner.

creature.name: McGruff the Crime Dog
creature.introduction: I been fightin' crime so many years, I don't even know what else to do.
creature.greeting: Hello traveller. Are you a criminal? I didn't think so...
creature.story: I'm a storyteller, but I fear there isn't much to tell. I've been in this dungeon so long.

traps: In the treasure chest along with the wrench, you find 2 cobras. One of them smiles. The other bites you. -1 hit point

name: Dungeon
room_description: The room is dry and dark. You can faintly see bones scattered across the floor. Something smells. You think that you can hear breathing.

creature.name: Zombie mczombieface
creature.story: [Narrator]: You're not gonna get much of a response from this one, better solve the challenge and get out of here.

traps: Not sure what treasure you expected to find among all these bones. You get bit by a plague-rat. -2 hitpoints.
